      • captcha

        @RequestMapping(value="/captcha",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public void captcha(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                                                                             throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                                                                                    java.io.IOException
        处理验证码获取请求
        参数:
        request - HTTP请求实体
        response - HTTP响应实体
        抛出:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - Servlet处理异常
        java.io.IOException - IO处理异常

        @RequestMapping(value="/othersHeadImage",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public void displayHeadImage(@RequestParam(value="userId")
                                                                                                                     long userId,
                                                                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)

      • resetPassword

        @RequestMapping(value="/resetPWD",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView resetPassword(@RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="code")
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String code,
                                                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="password")
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String password,
                                                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="captcha")
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String captcha,
                                                                                                                                    @SessionAttribute(value="randomString")
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String randomString)
        处理找回密码请求
        参数:
        email - 邮箱地址
        code - 邮箱验证码
        password - 新密码
        captcha - 验证码
        randomString - Session中的验证码字符串
        返回:
        跳转视图及相关模型
